definition: see 惺惺惜惺惺[xing1 xing1 xi1 xing1 xing1]
tranquil/understand
tranquil/understand
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to cherish/to begrudge/to pity/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: A talk to two people alternate like knows like.
sentences.chinese: 一番交谈令两人互生惺惺相惜之情。

sentences.english: They treated each other with respect as if they were real brothers.
sentences.chinese: 他们惺惺相惜就像是亲兄弟一样。

sentences.english: That shows a certain level of kinship.
sentences.chinese: 这在显示出了一定程度上的惺惺相惜。

sentences.english: Elizabeth Taylor and Michael Jackson were two peas in one odd pod.
sentences.chinese: 迈克杰克逊和伊丽莎白泰勒二人惺惺相惜。

sentences.english: The hare and the tortoise by this time had become pretty good friends and they did some thinking together.
sentences.chinese: 这下子，兔子和乌龟成了惺惺相惜的好朋友。

definition: familiarity at first sight
to regret not having met earlier (idiom); It is nice to meet you finally./It feels like we have known each other all along.
fellow sufferers empathize with each other (idiom); misery loves company
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
congenial
to be evenly matched/to meet one's match
to know oneself/to be intimate or close/intimate friend
intimate friendship/bosom buddies
lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
each other/one another
to give one's bare heart into sb else's keeping (idiom); sb has one's absolute confidence/to trust completely/to confide in sb with entire sincerity
intimate friend/close friend
a friend in times of tribulations (idiom); a friend in need is a friend indeed
not to hold anything back (idiom)/(of close friends etc) to tell each other everything
to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
to be kindred spirits/to hit it off
